verbose_text: At the molecular level, IL-6 increases the activity of DNA methyltransferases 1 (DNMT1) with activating effects on the JAK / STAT3, NF-kappaB and PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathways [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR] affecting the regulation of autophagy related functions, that are required to maintain cellular homeostasis under stress [XREF_BIBR], such as a prenatal insult.
evidence: IL-6 increases the activity of DNA methyltransferases 1
